sectiontype.name: actionicon
sectiontype.description: An actionicon which schould be installed.

key.name: tool
key.description: Name of the tool where the actionicon should be installed. If you want to install a property to PortalObject please choose portal_url. this is because portal_url is a tool an it provides a method to get PortalObject. I think this is more consistent as creating a new name for referencing to the Portalobject.

key.name: category
key.description: It's the same like the category by actions. Specify where the icon is used.

key.name: action_id
key.description: Here comes the unique identifier of an action in. So that the icon is connected with the right id.

key.name: icon_expr
key.description: ID of the icon so that zope can find it

key.name: title
key.description: Choose a title for the icon.

key.name: priority
key.description: Choos a priority for the icon so that you plone know wich have to be taken first.

multisection.description: Inherit from section type actionicon. "actionicon" have to stand around every action. this is for knowing start and end of the actionicon.
